response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. We believe it could be a valuable asset to your collection or operations, potentially enhancing your productivity or personal satisfaction. We understand that value is subjective and varies from person to person, so we're confident this offer will align with your expectations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your life.", "product_price": 12000}
